description:
Work with any number of rows in Microsoft Dataverse! Update Column values / Assign / Set State / Delete.
Empower yourself to achieve more.
This tool is useful to trigger workflows or plugins, as well as bulk updating any number of records with fixed values.
It can also delete, assign, and set state of records by the filter specified.
releaseNotes:
Latest version:

Calculated column values! Read more at https://jonasr.app/BDU
Nice and shiny lookup dialog used when setting lookup columns
Reloading last used query when opening the tool
Improved performance when retrieving records
Fixed bug when getting errors during Delete

---

Version 1.2019.12.1:

#19 Reassign records to Team or User
#15 Update Status and Status Reason
#11 Support multi-line values for memo type attributes
#31 Open records by double clicking in the grid
#32 Handle Qualify/Win/Lose requests when changing status of Lead/Opportunity

---

Version 1.2019.6.1:

#29 Added option to wait between calls to server. Thanks Mats Sundbergh @cint-mats!
#28 XML attribute values with only space got trimmed, now fixed.
#26 Incorrect warning text during Delete.
#25 Errors were always ignored during Delete, not anymore.
Fixed tab-order for usability.
Rebranded for 2019.

---

Version 1.2018.10.2:

#1 Option to only update/delete selected records
#3 ExecuteMultiple for updates to improve performance
#16 Retrieve all pages instead of just first page (5000 records)
#21 Bulk Data Updater can now Bulk Delete too
#22 Added possibility to cancel long running operations
#24 Edit XML window did not resize well
summary: Work with any number of rows in Microsoft Dataverse! Update Column values / Assign / Set State / Delete. Empower yourself to achieve more.
title: Bulk Data Updater for XrmToolBox
